The Tamagotchi () [tamaoti] is a handheld digital pet, 
created in Japan by Akihiro Yokoi (ja) of WiZ and Aki Maita of Bandai. It was first 
sold by Bandai on November 23, 1996 in Japan, quickly becoming one of the 
biggest toy fads of the 1990s.
